reporting.reporttable.TableQuery: SELECT StepDisplayName AS 'Step name', [Value] AS 'Number of contacts' FROM ( SELECT COUNT(StateObjectID) AS Value, StateStepID FROM CMS_AutomationState WHERE StateObjectType = 'om.contact' AND StateStepID IN ( SELECT StepID FROM CMS_WorkflowStep WHERE StepWorkflowID = @AutomationProcessID ) GROUP BY StateStepID ) Groups JOIN CMS_WorkflowStep ON Groups.StateStepID = StepID ORDER BY StepType
